content:
Hill Climbing for Parameter Tuning

  • Problem Description: PA

    • Examples: Troubleshooting Records (21 attributes)
    • Background Knowledge: Parameterized Max Rules
    • Hypothesis Language: Vector of 14 Numeric Parameters
    • I Initial state: Vector of Numeric Parameter
    • O Operators
      • Add 2.5% of parameter value to each parameter
      • Subtract 2.5% of parameter value to each parameter
    • E Cost of Misclassification

    If there's an X > *Y*
    Class 1.
    If distance from station > *Z*
    Class 2.
    If distance from station <= *Z*
    and there's no X <= *A*
    Class 3.
